Description: Fragment of a limestone stela of Neferabu.
Curator's comments: Published Kitchen, Ram. Insc. Vol 3 p774 Part of .154 Published: HTBM Part 9: Plate XXX PM I Part 2: p.xix

Neferabet is the owner of TT5; this stela may have come from this tomb or perhaps one of the shrines at Deir el-Medina. There are a number of other stelae and objects from this tomb in the BM--see discussions in BMHT 9, 34-7. Tomb PM i2, 12-14; Vandier in MIFAO 69
Bibliographic references: James 1970 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc., in the British Museum, Part 9. (Pl.30)
